DOC.brief_summary: The prospective cohort study, SuTra2, assesses the functional and socio-economic status of patients who were operated on for a severe limb injury resulting in amputation or limb preservation 1 and 2 years after the 2010 Haiti earthquake.
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring and Treatment of Extremity Trauma for Mass Casualties in Difficult Contexts
DOC.criteria: Patients, with limb injuries due to the earthquake, Who underwent limb surgery, which ended up in limb amputation or limb conservation. Exclusion criteria : Limb injury not related to the earthquake No surgery for the limb injury
